title: Slackware-Based Porteus Linux 5.01 Released with Linux Kernel 6.5
description:
Porteus 5.01 distribution is now available for download based on Slackware Linux and powered by the latest Linux 6.5 kernel series. Here's what's new!

The post Slackware-Based Porteus Linux 5.01 Released with Linux Kernel 6.5 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
